## Part 2: Research questions

**Research quesion 1:**

Is working out in the past 30 days is associated with the frequency of a person being nerouvs during previous month difference between men and femail?


```{r}

Nervous_sex_exercise <- brfss2013 %>% select(sex,exerany2, misnervs)

Nervous_sex_exercise %>% filter(!is.na(misnervs),!is.na(sex) ) %>% group_by(sex) %>% summarise(count= n())

Nervous_sex_exercise %>% filter(!is.na(sex)) %>% group_by(misnervs) %>% summarise(x=sum(sex))

test <- Nervous_sex_exercise %>% filter(!is.na(misnervs),!is.na(sex) ) %>% group_by(misnervs,sex) %>% summarise(count= n())  %>% mutate(perc=count/sum(count)) %>% arrange

Nervous_sex_exercise %>% filter(!is.na(misnervs),!is.na(sex)) %>% ggplot(aes(x=misnervs, fill=sex))+geom_bar()


ggplot(test, aes(x=misnervs, y=perc, fill= sex ))+geom_bar(stat="identity")

test$misnervs

##ggplot replace count with percentage in geom_barâ†’https://stackoverflow.com/questions/24776200/ggplot-replace-count-with-percentage-in-geom-bar/48602277

Nervous_sex_exercise %>% filter(!is.na(sex),!is.na(misnervs) ) %>% group_by(sex) %>% summarise(x=n()) %>% mutate(y=x/sum(x))


```


```{r}

##
ggplot(test, aes(x=misnervs, y=perc, fill= sex ))+geom_bar(stat="identity")
ggplot(test, aes(x=misnervs))+geom_histogram()
```
